attributes.action: Provide Electoral Commission published results in an open spreadsheet format
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current 2005 and 2001 General Election results are provided by the Electoral Commission in Proprietary Microsoft Excel format instead of an accessible open spreadsheet format (such as OASIS OpenDocument/ISO/IEC 26300). We request the PM to reform/modernise the Electoral Commission and publish results in OpenDocument format as well as online (HTML) format.
